alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Freestone; Henderson; Navarro (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 3:17PM CDT until March 31 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Freestone County in central Texas... South central Henderson County in central Texas... Northwestern Anderson County in central Texas... East central Navarro County in north central Texas... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 317 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Trinidad Lake, or 18 miles east of Corsicana, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Athens, Malakoff, Trinidad, Coon Creek Lake, Trinidad Lake, Richland-Chambers Reservoir, Cross Roads, Goodlow, Springfield, Cayuga and Crescent Heights. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for central and north central Texas. For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
